page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN ULLAPOOL.
page.content: During the tourist season most of the jobs in Ullapool are tourist related from bed and breakfast,guest houses, motels,hotels to shops and camping sites. The people employed in many of these jobs come to the Ullapool area only for the high season. Other important sources of employment are the Highland Regional Council Roads,Water and Sewerage Departments, the Fishing Industries,the Forestry Commission,the Quarry,Education and a local Building Contractor. In addition to these major employers there are many small,self-employed businessmen employing plumbers,masons, electricians,joiners,engineers, painters and decorators. The sub-Post Office and British Telecom employ staff but the telephone exchange will soon be automatic.
